titleStmt.title: Proposals for printing a new atlas Moses pitt of London, bookseller, being encouraged by His Most Sacred Majesty, His Royal Highness the Duke of York, his Highness Prince Rupert, both the universities, the Royal Society, and divers others, the nobility, gentry, and learned men of this nation, to undertake the printing of an accurate description of the world; and resolving to proceed with all convenient diligence, for the more effectual carrying on thereof, maketh these following offers.
titleStmt.author: Pitt, Moses, fl. 1654-1696.

titleStmt.author: Pitt, Moses, fl. 1654-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
